bio: Im a Full Stack Web Developer specialized in Javascript with a Math and Physics background, passionate for back-end web development I specialized in NodeJS. I think technology exists to make human work easier so I'm alwasy trying to expand my knowledge so I can make a proper use of Technology to solve real life problems and to make my work and the work of my team a bit easier.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Created web app that keeps audits records and generates reports. The app was a secured API using JWT and the UI is built with ReactJS. The app has helped the company to reduce paperwork and boost efficiency.

experience.title: Quality Improvement Assistant
experience.description: Create an MS Access database to keep records of the minors we serve and generate statistic reports. Earned 2017 Employee of the Year Award as a result.

experience.title: IT Technician
experience.description: Performed PC and Server maintenance and repair.  Network and printer’s setup. Deployed Linux servers to host websites and store data. Participated in the development of a static website for one of the university’s extension center.
